# Contributing to autodE

Contributions in any form are very much welcome. To make managing these
easier, we kindly ask that you follow the guidelines outlined
[here](https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/dev/contributing.html).

- Tom Young ([@t-young31](https://github.com/t-young31))
- Joseph Silcock ([@josephsilcock](https://github.com/josephsilcock))
- Kjell Jorner ([@kjelljorner](https://github.com/kjelljorner))
- Thibault Lestang ([@tlestang](https://github.com/tlestang))
- Domen Pregeljc ([@dpregeljc](https://github.com/dpregeljc))
- Jonathon Vandezande ([@jevandezande](https://github.com/jevandezande))
- Shoubhik Maiti ([@shoubhikraj](https://github.com/shoubhikraj))
- Daniel Hollas ([@danielhollas](https://github.com/danielhollas))
- Nils Heunemann ([@nilsheunemann](https://github.com/NilsHeunemann))
- Sijie Fu ([@sijiefu](https://github.com/SijieFu))

**autodE** is a Python module initially designed for the automated calculation of reaction profiles from SMILES strings of
reactant(s) and product(s). Current features include: transition state location, conformer searching, atom mapping,
Python wrappers for a range of electronic structure theory codes, SMILES parsing, association complex generation, and
 reaction profile generation.

There is a [slack workspace](https://autodeworkspace.slack.com) for development and discussion - please
[email](mailto:autodE-gh@outlook.com?subject=autodE%20slack) to be added. Pull requests are
very welcome but must pass all the unit tests prior to being merged. Please write code and tests!
See the [todo list](https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/projects/1) for features on the horizon.
Bugs and feature requests should be raised on the [issue page](https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/issues). 
> **_NOTE:_**  We'd love more contributors to this project!

To install **autodE** with [conda](https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/autode):
```
conda install autode -c conda-forge
```
see the [installation guide](https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/install.html) for installing from source.

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Improved CRFO and PRFO optimiser by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/344
* Fix compatibility with numpy v2.0 by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/348
* Add combination of bonds primitive and trust radius optimiser by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/345
* Improve DIC to Cartesian transformation by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/349
* More comprehensive optimiser convergence checks by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/351


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.4.3...v1.4.4

## What's Changed
* Template by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/326
* Improve string parsing in reaction.delta method by @NilsHeunemann in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/325
* fix no solvent by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/334
* Fix error in "atoms_to_xyz_file()" in "input_output.py" by @SijieFu in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/332
* Allow saving coordinate trajectory on disk by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/329
* Refactor Hessian update by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/337
* DHS improvements by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/338
* DHS variable step size by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/342

## New Contributors
* @NilsHeunemann made their first contribution in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/325
* @SijieFu made their first contribution in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/332

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3

## What's Changed
* Automatic differentiation for primitives by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/311
* More comprehensive primitive generation by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/314
* Speedup package import time by @danielhollas in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/319
* Allow configurable ORCA output extensions by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/323

## New Contributors
* @danielhollas made their first contribution in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/319

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

## What's Changed
* Fix G16 hessian extraction by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/288
* Minenkov thermochem by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/292
* Fix DHSGS large step size bug by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/297
* Implement i-EIP method by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/299
* Refactor primitive coordinates and optimisers by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/303
* Reload charge etc from file by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/305
* Temp as value by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/306
* Faster IDPP by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/302


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

## What's Changed
* Fix RFO hessian update bug by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/254
* Fix tests that use xTB on Windows by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/250
* Remove deprecated get method calls by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/238
* Add option to change xTB parameterisation version and temperature by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/252
* Add trust-radius quasi-Newton optimiser by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/262
* Add exception for NEB init with <2 images by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/270
* Raise exception if prune returns no conformers by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/271
* Fix QChem not using max_core by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/275
* Implement DHS and DHS-GS methods by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/272
* macOS multiprocessing bugfix by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/278
* Type checking by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/277
* DHS code improvements by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/280
* V1.4.0 by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/281


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.3.5...v1.4.0

## What's Changed

* Ignore doc paths for code CI by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/235
* Add "ERROR" level to logging by @shoubhikraj in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/231
* Fix parsing Qchem v6 output by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/234
* Fix units for values when dividing and multiplying by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/242
* Fix xtb opt with cartesian constraints by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/247
* Remove hessian unit conversion on normal mode calculation by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/243

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.3.4...v1.3.5

## What's Changed
* Improve exception for invalid ts template folder path in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/213
* Add `from_species` TS constructor in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/214
* Add reaction step checkpointing in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/215
* Fix cleanup with null filename in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/224
* Throw exception on invalid molecule spin state in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/220


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.3.3...v1.3.4

## What's Changed
* Add checking for incompatible charge in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/200
* PRFO TS optimiser improvements in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/199


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.3.2...v1.3.3

## What's Changed
* 🐞 Inherit solvent in TS guess from_species in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/185
* 🐞 Remove opt file before copying in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/192
* Switch LGTM to CodeQL in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/188
* Black codebase in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/189

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.3.1...v1.3.2

## What's Changed
* Exits working directory if wrapped function throws an exception. by @jevandezande in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/175
* Test fixture by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/177
* Fix cleanup for non external io method by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/179

## New Contributors
* @jevandezande made their first contribution in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/175

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1

## What's Changed
* Update bond definitions in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/151
* 🐞 Bugfix for orca charge extraction in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/154
* Add frequency scaling in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/158
* Improved on-board constrained optimisation in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/153

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.2.3...v1.3.0

Minor bugfixes and features.

## What's Changed

* Fixes incorrect assignment of unreasonable geometries in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/127
* Update documentation in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/129

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

Major updates some of which break backwards compatibility. Includes refactoring, usability and feature updates. See https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/changelog.html 

## What's Changed

* IDPP for NEB in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/104
* Improve TS guess functions in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/108

* Refactor multistep reaction in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/110
* Gaussian wrapper bugfix 🐞 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/112

* Update documentation in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/122
* Improve unit test coverage in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/124


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.1.3...v1.2.0

Minor updates and improvements. Maintains backwards compatibility 

## What's Changed
* Improves calc_thermo usability in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/93
* Allow for multiprocessing spawn in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/94
* Adds benchmark data and improves tests in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/96 and https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/99
* Improve reaction classification exceptions in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/97

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

## What's Changed
* Enable xtb as _hcode_ with Gaussian by @kjelljorner in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/86
* Fixes error with several ring double bonds by @t-young31 in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/87

See the [changelog](https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/changelog.html) for a summary.
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

* Documentation update and additional typing by in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/75 and https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/71
* Fixes divide by zero in parallel conformer calculations in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/74
* Fixes incorrect filename for NCI conformers in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/77
* Comparison of similar energies without np.isclose in https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/pull/83

See the [changelog](https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/changelog.html) for a summary.
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

Major updates. Including improved mode checking, parallel conformer calculations and energy history. Unfortunately breaks some backwards compatibility. 

See the [changelog](https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/changelog.html) for the full set of changes.

Bugfix release

- Tweaks repulsion parameters in minimisation to build fused rings
- Enables SMILES parsing with "X(...)1" branching
- Fixes spin multiplicity for odd numbers of hydrogens
- Improves ring closure 3D build
- Fixes incorrect implicit valency for aromatic heteroatoms
- Improves metal finding in SMILES strings with regex
- Corrects atom type for sp2 group 16 elements
- Fixes dihedral rotation with atoms not close to any other

Adds default ECPs to Gaussian and NWChem calculations
Adds atomic number and atomic symbol attributes to an Atom
Adds a check for molecule initialisation with an odd number of electrons and but no unpaired electrons
Improves NWChem output monitoring
Improves keyword setting for WF and DFT methods
Modifies default ORCA auxiliary basis sets

Fixes inconsistent bond rearrangments being discarded based on neighbour lists
Fixes default breaking bond distances exceeding something reasonable
Introduces a molecular radius property for a species
Introduces initial non-overlapping geometries for molecular complexes
Bugfixes, NEB TS guesses, computational methods population and improved wrappers
result.name: Beta release

result.value:
* [Python](https://www.python.org/) > v. 3.7
* One of:
   * [ORCA](https://sites.google.com/site/orcainputlibrary/home/) > v. 4.0
   * [Gaussian09](https://gaussian.com/glossary/g09/)
   * [Gaussian16](https://gaussian.com/gaussian16/)
   * [NWChem](http://www.nwchem-sw.org/index.php/Main_Page) > 6.5
   * [QChem](https://www.q-chem.com/) > 5.4
* One of:
   * [XTB](https://www.chemie.uni-bonn.de/pctc/mulliken-center/software/xtb/xtb/) > v. 6.1
   * [MOPAC](http://openmopac.net/)

The Python dependencies are listed in requirements.txt are best satisfied using a conda install (Miniconda or Anaconda).

Reaction profiles in  **autodE** are generated by initialising _Reactant_ and _Product_ objects,
generating a _Reaction_ from those and invoking _calculate_reaction_profile()_.
For example, to  calculate the profile for a 1,2 hydrogen shift in a propyl radical:

```python
import autode as ade
ade.Config.n_cores = 8

r = ade.Reactant(name='reactant', smiles='CC[C]([H])[H]')
p = ade.Product(name='product', smiles='C[C]([H])C')

reaction = ade.Reaction(r, p, name='1-2_shift')
reaction.calculate_reaction_profile()  # creates 1-2_shift/ and saves profile
```

See [examples/](https://github.com/duartegroup/autodE/tree/master/examples) for
more examples and [duartegroup.github.io/autodE/](https://duartegroup.github.io/autodE/) for
additional documentation.
